);

);

    "Role" INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Users" (
    "Id" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_Users" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    "Email" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "PasswordHash" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "Salt" TEXT NOT NULL,
    "Role" INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE "Employees" (
    "Id" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_Employees" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    "UserId" INTEGER NOT NULL,
    "FullName" TEXT NULL,
    "DateOfBirth" TEXT NULL,
    "Gender" INTEGER NULL,
    "Address" TEXT NULL,
    "JoinDate" TEXT NULL,
    "VacationRemaining" INTEGER NULL,
    "CurrentWorkplace" TEXT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Employees_Users_UserId" FOREIGN KEY ("UserId") REFERENCES "Users" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

    "Id" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_Employees" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,

    "DateOfBirth" TEXT NULL,
    "Gender" INTEGER NULL,
    "Address" TEXT NULL,
    "JoinDate" TEXT NULL,

    "CurrentWorkplace" TEXT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Employees_Users_UserId" FOREIGN KEY ("UserId") REFERENCES "Users" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE "EmployeeSkills" (
    "Id" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_EmployeeSkills" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,

    CONSTRAINT "FK_EmployeeSkills_Employees_EmployeeId" FOREIGN KEY ("EmployeeId") REFERENCES "Employees" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE,

);

    "Id" INTEGER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT "PK_EmployeeSkills" PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,

            .ToList()

Properties.commandText:
SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."FullName", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "s0"."Name", "s0"."Id", "s0"."Id0"
FROM "Employees" AS "e"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "s"."Name", "e1"."Id", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "e1"."EmployeeId"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e1"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e1"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s0" ON "e"."Id" = "s0"."EmployeeId"
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e0"
    WHERE "e"."Id" = "e0"."EmployeeId" AND "e0"."SkillId" = @__skillId_0)
ORDER BY "e"."Id", "s0"."Id"

SELECT "e"."Id", "e"."FullName", "e"."CurrentWorkplace", "s0"."Name", "s0"."Id", "s0"."Id0"
FROM "Employees" AS "e"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "s"."Name", "e1"."Id", "s"."Id" AS "Id0", "e1"."EmployeeId"
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e1"
    INNER JOIN "Skills" AS "s" ON "e1"."SkillId" = "s"."Id"
) AS "s0" ON "e"."Id" = "s0"."EmployeeId"
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM "EmployeeSkills" AS "e0"
    WHERE "e"."Id" = "e0"."EmployeeId" AND "e0"."SkillId" = @__skillId_0)
ORDER BY "e"."Id", "s0"."Id"
